transactionIdentification.description: Provides details about unique transaction identification known by the participant

accountServicerTransactionIdentification.description: Provides details about unique transaction identification known by the account servicer

participantIdentificationId.description: Participant identifier provided by A5X during the participant registration

participantIdentificationCategory.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode

accountIdentificationId.description: Account identifier defined by the participant

collateralIdentification.description: Collateral ID given by the requestor participant

operationValueAmount.description: Amount requested to umbrella type distribution

operationValueCurrency.description: Currency code in which the amount is denominated
operationValueCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

collateralValueAmount.description: Collateral accepted value amount after taking into account the haircut

collateralValueCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

collateralStatusCode.description: Provides a proprietary status of each processing requested
collateralStatusCode.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCollateralStatusCode

collateralStatusErrorCode.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalErrorCollateralCode, ExternalErrorRegistrationCode, ExternalAllocationErrorCode

collateralStatusErrorRefId.description: Reference ID for collateral status error

collateralTransferInstructionStatusCode.description: Overall status code of the collateral transfer instruction
collateralTransferInstructionStatusCode.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCollateralStatusCode

collateralTransferInstructionStatusError.description: Error code for transfer instruction status
collateralTransferInstructionStatusError.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalErrorCollateralCode, ExternalErrorRegistrationCode, ExternalAllocationErrorCode

collateralTransferInstructionStatusError.description: Error description for transfer instruction status

Reference ID for transfer instruction status error
